errors.error_description: The command `sudo apt-get install make` is for Debian-based Linux systems and is not the correct way to ensure GNU Make is available on IBM i, which typically uses `yum` for package management.
correction_candidates: On IBM i, install GNU Make by running `yum install gmake`.
On IBM i, install GNU Make by running `install-gmake`.
On IBM i, install GNU Make by running `apt-get install gmake`.
GNU Make is pre-installed on all IBM i systems.
errors.golden_answer: On IBM i, install GNU Make by running `yum install gmake`.
